alternatives.transcript: Wow. This is me talking into the voice memos app on my phone, where we're gonna keep talking into, I don't know, maybe, like, thirty two seconds, which is the length of theoretically four eight second recordings. But that should give us enough that we hit the two eight second recordings and then have a third trailing recording, and that should set us to be in a situation where we can effectively test Alright. All the recording scenarios as well as the barge scenario. And that way, I don't have to keep doing this over and over again. You have to listen to it because I could just play it off my phone, and everyone's life becomes much easier. Mostly mine, to be honest, but I'm kind of okay with that. Anyways, bye, Steve.

sentences.text: This is me talking into the voice memos app on my phone, where we're gonna keep talking into, I don't know, maybe, like, thirty two seconds, which is the length of theoretically four eight second recordings.
But that should give us enough that we hit the two eight second recordings and then have a third trailing recording, and that should set us to be in a situation where we can effectively test Alright.
All the recording scenarios as well as the barge scenario.
And that way, I don't have to keep doing this over and over again.
You have to listen to it because I could just play it off my phone, and everyone's life becomes much easier.
Mostly mine, to be honest, but I'm kind of okay with that.
